com.broudy.gcm.boundary.enhanced.fxmlrelated

Class EnhancedFXMLLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader
      • com.broudy.gcm.boundary.enhanced.fxmlrelated.EnhancedFXMLLoader

  • public class EnhancedFXMLLoader
extends javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader
    This enhanced loader will use Guice's Injector to instantiate all inter-connected controllers if there are any, then it will link them one by one.

    Created on the 4th of June, 2019.

    Author:
    Julian Broudy
